conversation.content: So um okay wait—no let me just—my internet's been droppin' all week and I'm like—what's the word—it's drivin' me nuts, you know?
Right, okay, um, I'm gonna get this fixed for you today, no question. Let me just, uh, pull up your account here and, hmm, what's your account number or phone number on file?
Oh it's uh... wait lemme find—no actually just use my phone, it's 555-0147.

Got it, perfect. So I'm seeing account ACC-7823-NV here, and, um, wow okay there's definitely something going on. I can see, uh, seventeen disconnection events just since Monday, which is absolutely not acceptable.
Seventeen?! See I knew it wasn't just—I mean I kept thinkin' maybe it's my—but no, seventeen times?
Yeah no, this is, um, this is on us, not you. Looking at signal report SIG-4492-QM, your modem's getting, uh, these intermittent power fluctuations from our end, which is causing those drops.
So wait can you just—what's the fix here? Like how fast can we—I work from home so...
No no, we're fixing this today. I'm, um, I'm escalating this right now to our field techs with priority ticket PRI-8834-XK, and they'll be out there within, uh, within four hours max.
Four hours? Um that's—okay but like—wait will they call first or just show up or what?

They'll call. The tech assigned to work order WRK-9921-TF will, um, they'll call you about thirty minutes before arrival, and uh, here's what I'm also doing—I'm crediting your account for the entire week.
Oh! That's—I mean I wasn't even—but yeah okay that's actually really... thanks.
Absolutely.
So um, while they're fixin' it—wait sorry one more thing—is my wifi gonna be totally dead or...?

So it'll keep doing what it's doing now, um, dropping and reconnecting, until they fix it. But, uh, once they replace the line amp—that's component CMP-3382-LL that's failing—it should be rock solid again.
Line amp? Is that like a—what's that word—amplifier thing? Sorry I'm not—
Yeah exactly, it's, um, it boosts the signal to your house. Yours is, uh, basically dying, showing error code ERR-5543-RC, which is why you're getting those drops every few hours.
Um okay so—wait they're comin' today for sure right? Cause I've got this huge video call at six and I can't have it droppin' then.
Hundred percent. I'm, um, I'm putting a note right now in ticket PRI-8834-XK that you've got a critical meeting at six, so, uh, they'll prioritize getting there well before that.
You're actually—this is so much better than I thought—I was expectin' to be on hold forever and get nowhere but you're like really fixin' it!

That's what we're here for, and um, listen, I'm also giving you my direct extension EXT-7429, so if for any reason the tech doesn't show or you have any issues, you call me directly and we'll sort it out immediately.
